description: This file contains test cases for the integration of the Cerebras model with the Agent framework, utilizing DuckDuckGoTools for querying and verifying tool usage in various asynchronous and streaming scenarios.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests the basic synchronous tool usage with the Cerebras model and DuckDuckGoTools.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response with tool calls and verifies the presence of tool call events.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with the Cerebras model.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test verifying tool call events in the response stream.

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_content
methods.description: Tests the tool usage with an additional prompt to summarize key events.
